languages.text: {n}Ваше сознание плывет, и сквозь туманную пелену вы различаете неминуемо приближающуся фигуру стражника. Взгляд скользит по зале в поисках выхода, решения — пока, где-то на периферии зрения, вы не замечаете легкий алый штрих. Это зажглись визоры очнувшегося кибермастифа, давая вам шанс бежать...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ваше сознание плывет, и сквозь туманную пелену вы различаете неминуемо приближающуся фигуру стражника. Взгляд скользит по зале в поисках выхода, решения — пока, где-то на периферии зрения, вы не замечаете легкий алый штрих. Это зажглись визоры очнувшегося кибермастифа, давая вам шанс бежать...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Your head swims, and through the haze you recognise the figure of a guard coming closer and closer with no sign of stopping. Your gaze sweeps over the room, searching for a way out, for a solution, until, somewhere at the periphery of your vision, you notice a streak of scarlet. It is the cyber-mastiff's visors lighting up, giving you a chance to run...{/n}

languages.text: {n}你感到头晕目眩。透过眼前的烟尘，你看到某个守卫的身影离你越来越近，没有任何停止的迹象。你扫视着整个房间，寻找逃离险境的方法，寻找一线生机。到最后，你注意到，视线边缘某个地方闪过了一道深红色的光芒，是格雷托的面甲亮了起来。你抓住这个机会，忙不迭地向前跑去……{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your head swims, and through the haze you recognise the figure of a guard coming closer and closer with no sign of stopping. It is the cyber-mastiff's visors lighting up, giving you a chance to run...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Te da vueltas la cabeza, y pese al aturdimiento logras discernir la figura de un guardia que se te acerca sin intención de detenerse. Recorres la estancia con la mirada en busca de una salida, de una solución, hasta que vislumbras un fulgor escarlata por el rabillo del ojo. Es el visor del cibermastín que acaba de encenderse, brindándote con ello una oportunidad para correr...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your head swims, and through the haze you recognise the figure of a guard coming closer and closer with no sign of stopping. Your gaze sweeps over the room, searching for a way out, for a solution, until, somewhere at the periphery of your vision, you notice a streak of scarlet. It is the cyber-mastiff's visors lighting up, giving you a chance to run...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Başın dönüyor, pusun içinde durma belirtisi göstermeden gitgide sana yaklaşan bir muhafız figürü görüyorsun. Bakışların odada bir çıkış yolu, bir çözüm arayarak geziniyor. Görüş alanının bir yerinde kızıl bir çizgi fark ediyorsun. Siber mastifin vizöründen yansıyan bu ışık sana kaçma fırsatı sunuyor...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your head swims, and through the haze you recognise the figure of a guard coming closer and closer with no sign of stopping. It is the cyber-mastiff's visors lighting up, giving you a chance to run...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Başın dönüyor, pusun içinde durma belirtisi göstermeden gitgide sana yaklaşan bir muhafız figürü görüyorsun. Bakışların odada bir çıkış yolu, bir çözüm arayarak geziniyor. Görüş alanının bir yerinde kızıl bir çizgi fark ediyorsun. Siber mastifin vizöründen yansıyan bu ışık sana kaçma fırsatı sunuyor...{/n}

languages.text: {n}頭がくらくらし、ぼんやりとした中で、止まる気配もなく近づいてくる衛兵の姿が見える。部屋の中をさっと探り、脱出口や解決策を探したところ、視界の端のほうに鮮やかな緋色の光の筋を見つけた。それは光るサイバーマスチフのバイザーで、逃げるチャンスを与えてくれるものだ…{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your head swims, and through the haze you recognise the figure of a guard coming closer and closer with no sign of stopping. Your gaze sweeps over the room, searching for a way out, for a solution, until, somewhere at the periphery of your vision, you notice a streak of scarlet. It is the cyber-mastiff's visors lighting up, giving you a chance to run...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}頭がくらくらし、ぼんやりとした中で、止まる気配もなく近づいてくる衛兵の姿が見える。部屋の中をさっと探り、脱出口や解決策を探したところ、視界の端のほうに鮮やかな緋色の光の筋を見つけた。それは光るサイバーマスチフのバイザーで、逃げるチャンスを与えてくれるものだ…{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous avez le tournis, et à travers la brume, vous reconnaissez la silhouette d'un garde qui s'approche sans la moindre intention de s'arrêter. Vous balayez la pièce du regard à la recherche d'une sortie, d'une solution, jusqu'à ce que vous remarquiez du coin de l'œil une traînée écarlate. Ce sont les visières du cyber-mastiff qui s'allument, vous laissant une chance de fuir...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your head swims, and through the haze you recognise the figure of a guard coming closer and closer with no sign of stopping. Your gaze sweeps over the room, searching for a way out, for a solution, until, somewhere at the periphery of your vision, you notice a streak of scarlet. It is the cyber-mastiff's visors lighting up, giving you a chance to run...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous avez le tournis, et à travers la brume, vous reconnaissez la silhouette d'un garde qui s'approche sans la moindre intention de s'arrêter. Vous balayez la pièce du regard à la recherche d'une sortie, d'une solution, jusqu'à ce que vous remarquiez du coin de l'œil une traînée écarlate. Ce sont les visières du cyber-mastiff qui s'allument, vous laissant une chance de fuir...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dein Kopf ist schwer, und durch den Dunst erkennst du die Gestalt einer Wache, die immer näher kommt, ohne Anstalten, stehenzubleiben. Dein Blick durchmisst den Raum, auf der Suche nach einem Ausgang, nach einer Lösung, bis du irgendwo am Rande deines Sichtfelds einen roten Streifen bemerkst. Es sind die die aufleuchtenden Visoren des Cyber-Mastiffs, die dir eine Chance zum Weglaufen verschaffen ...{/n}
